mapper.select: SELECT distinct year, semester FROM subject ORDER BY year desc, semester asc; -- 수강년도는 내림차순, 학기는 오름차순으로 조회
SELECT A.code,A.subjectNO,A.professor FROM schedule as B JOIN subject as A WHERE B.subjectID=A.subjectID AND B.email=#{email} AND A.year=#{year} AND A.semester=#{semester};
SELECT * FROM subject where year=#{year} and semester=#{semester};
SELECT DISTINCT major FROM subject WHERE year=#{year} AND semester=#{semester} ORDER BY major;
SELECT * FROM schedule WHERE email=#{email} AND subjectID=#{subjectID}
